attributes.action: Banish Bob Crow to Cuba.  Forever.
attributes.additional_details:
Bob Crow is a dinosaur, a commiesaurus.  Please prevent him from continually holding ordinary Londoners to ransom by banishing him to a communist country where he can't do any damage.

If the above is not possible due to some namby pamby European law on human rights then at least force him to leave his council house and give it someone who actually needs social housing.

rejection.details: Bob Crow's status as a union leader is a matter for the RMT union; his status as an occupant of council housing is a matter for the appropriate local authority.
